name: Tonguetwisters
0:
”Alexa open tongue twisters”
”Alexa open tongue twisters and tell me a tongue twister”
”Alexa open tongue twisters and give me one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tongue twisters
des:
Tongue twisters are a great way to practice and improve pronunciation and fluency. They can also help to improve accents by using alliteration, which is the repetition of one sound. 
Ask Alexa for a tongue twister and have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
